SEARCH
Package org.jlab.phaser.model

Class JobRecord

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.phaser.model.JobRecord
public final class JobRecord extends Object
An immutable job record.

This class represents a row of data from the JOB table of the Phaser database plus a count of results associated with the job.

    • JobRecord

      public JobRecord(long id, Date startDate, Date endDate, boolean continuous, boolean correct, float maxPhaseError, float maxMomentumError, int kickSamples, long count)
      Create a new JobRecord.
      Parameters:
      id - The job ID
      startDate - The job start date
      endDate - The job end date
      continuous - true for continuous running, false for once-and-done
      correct - true to correct, false to measure only
      maxPhaseError - The maximum phase angle error
      maxMomentumError - The maximum momentum error (dp/p)
      kickSamples - The number of samples per kick
      count - The number of results
